title: Ticket #3839: HTCondor fails to build on Debian 7 due to gsoap symbol collisions
description:
The following gsoap symbols need to be added to the global line in daemon.version.proper that has been created by Brian's patch in #3698:

soap_check_faultdetail; soap_markelement; soap_check_faultsubcode; soap_getelement; soap_putelement;
remarks:
2014-Jan-17 09:28:39 by tim:
This was fixed in 8.1.1, the patch does not apply cleanly to stable and debian already has a patch to build. This will get picked up by debian in the next stable release.
check_ins: 2013-Aug-08 13:00   Check-in [37136]: Additional gsoap global deps; needed for Deb7 proper build. #3839 (By Brian Bockelman )
creator: blin
